no-restricted-syntax.message: Hardcoded hex colors are not allowed. Use design system tokens from globals.css (e.g., --color-teal, --color-yellow) or Tailwind classes (e.g., bg-brand-teal, text-brand-yellow).
Hardcoded RGB colors are not allowed. Use design system tokens from globals.css or Tailwind classes.

Hardcoded Tailwind color classes are not allowed. Use design system tokens: bg-brand-teal, bg-brand-yellow, bg-brand-orange, bg-brand-aqua, bg-surface, text-ink, or existing semantic classes like bg-primary, bg-secondary, bg-muted.
